p: The complete chloroplast genome of T. giganteum was 165,289 bp in length with 35.6% of G + C content, comprising a large single copy (LSC) region of 91,747 bp, a small single copy (SSC) region of 22,550 bp, and a pair of inverted repeat (IRa and IRb) regions of 25,496 bp. The genome contained 132 genes including 86 protein-coding genes, 38 tRNA genes, and 8 rRNA genes.
